Text:
*sigh* What should I do? Nothing seems to be going
right...
N-Next...is...Omega, any ideas?
Don't ask me. I can't think of anything right now.

...Maybe trying to give him chocolates is annoying
him. He could be warning me not to get too carried
away...
No. That can't be the case. It can't, but...
We can't possibly fathom what he's thinking...

...If I may be so bold, Lady Alpha, do you intend to
give up just like that?

Lady Alpha, I told you to do what you desire.
Of course, I will spare no effort in helping you.

But...is your true desire really just to not
disappoint or trouble him?
Please tell us what you truly desire.
...What I desire is...

To express my gratitude to Cid... The debt I owe him
is beyond words, but I hope to repay at least a small
portion of it.

Heheh... I feel ashamed of nearly losing sight of my
own feelings.
So, what do you intend to do next?

I'll keep trying until I can give them to him. After
the help I've received from all of you, I can't just
give up now...!
Understood. In that case...
It seems the time has come to use this notebook!

I-Isn't that...?! Lambda, you're really going for
it...!

What do you mean? What's so special about that
notebook?

It's a notebook on training soldiers. Inside, there
are training methods, physical conditioning, and
even tactics for breaking an individual's spirit.
It's a terrifying item, but—

Normally, it's not something that would ever be used
on Lady Alpha. Lambda, you're fearless.

Normally, yes. But this is a special edition
tailored to Lady Alpha.

Lady Alpha. I've been researching successful
Valentine's Day strategies since hearing your
concerns. I'll put you through a special training
program based on my research.

It's going to be a rigorous regimen...but if you're
prepared to take on the challenge, I, Lambda, will
support you every step of the way!
...I'm prepared.

I'm now just a nameless recruit... Please train me,
Instructor Lambda.
Understood...I mean, fine!

We'll conduct special training at the outdoor
training center! Follow me, and no dawdling!
...They're both quite fired up, aren't they?
Maybe what we were lacking was that intensity.
Well, uh...I guess we'll just observe quietly.

If you survive this special training, you'll be able
to fulfill your true Valentine's Day desires.

But until then, you are the lowest of all creatures!
Understand?!
Ma'am, yes ma'am!
Louder!
Ma'am, yes ma'am!

Whether you win or lose on Valentine's Day all
depends on you! If you don't want to end up a
cowardly chicken, make up your mind! Say it!
Ma'am, yes ma'am!
Hmph, good enough. Impressive by your standards.

Strong convictions reside in a strong body.
Grab those weights and start doing squats!
Ma'am, yes ma'am!

Good! Now shout out your feelings for Master Shadow!
How do you feel toward him?!
Grateful!
I can't hear you. How do you feel?!
Grateful!
How do you feel?!
Grateful!

Lambda's completely in the zone, isn't she?
And taking on Lady Alpha no less...

Lambda can transform into a demon for Lady Alpha's
sake. There's something to learn from that level of
commitment.
Why am I actually impressed...?
Please accept my handmade chocolates!

Don't look away! Look at the person you're giving
the chocolate to!
Please accept my homemade chocolates!

Pathetic! What're you, a piece of chocolate? Is a
piece of chocolate going to hand out chocolate?!
Ridiculous!
Ack... Ma'am, no ma'am!!

Frustrated? Then channel that frustration into this
training! Press your arms against your body, use
your upturned eyes!

Simulating the act of giving the chocolates, huh? If
Lady Alpha gives them with that expression and pose,
even the mighty Master Shadow will surely—!
Yes, surely he will accept them...!
...Is Valentine's Day supposed to be like this...?
